text: It would be nice to have the columns in the aggregate and summary reports so that the data is sorted. In my case, the test plan has over 100 samplers and it would be nice to click on the "label" column and have the results sorted alphabetically.
creator: marcelojara@hotmail.com

text: *** Bug 58161 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

New patch to add summary sorter
